name: OneSwap
intro: A fully decentralized transaction protocol based on smart contracts
introduce: OneSwap is a fully decentralized trading protocol based on smart contracts. Token listing does not require permission, supports automated market making, and supports order book mode; and it improves user interaction through the built-in OneSwap Wallet and provides a one-stop trading experience. As a one-stop trading service platform on the general chain, OneSwap can be deployed on any blockchain platform that supports smart contracts.
